algorithm_technique: Brute force with bitmasking to explore all combinations of winning sections.
problem_summary_simple: Bob wants to win archery sections against Alice by using more arrows, maximizing his total score.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through all possible subsets of sections Bob can win using bitmasks, calculating score and arrow count for each subset.
key_insights: The problem can be framed as selecting a subset of scoring sections for Bob to win.
For each section, Bob needs at least one more arrow than Alice to win it.
A bitmask can represent which sections Bob aims to win.
